items.title: Mark Zuckerberg's empire at stake as Meta prepares to battle Trump's antitrust cops in court
items.description: Meta is preparing for the start of a courtroom battle Monday with the US government in an antitrust case that could force Mark Zuckerberg to break up his $1.3 trillion empire and sell one of its crown jewels: Instagram.

items.title: Tariff confusion leaves tech shoppers questioning if they should buy now or risk waiting
items.description: Trump's trade war leaves consumers wondering whether they should buy now or later.
